local ply = Entity(1)
local pos = ply:GetPos()

AIChaos_SoundCSPs = AIChaos_SoundCSPs or {}

for i = 1, 1000 do
    local snd = sounds[math.random(1, #sounds)]
    local csp = CreateSound(ply, snd)
    csp:SetSoundLevel(60)
    csp:Play()
    table.insert(AIChaos_SoundCSPs, csp)
end

timer.Simple(0.5, function()
    for _, csp in ipairs(AIChaos_SoundCSPs or {}) do
        if csp then csp:Stop() end
    end
    AIChaos_SoundCSPs = {}
end)
